title: Get a personalised garden sign and dibber for just £15.49!
content:
If you’re looking for a unique present for the gardener in your life, then the outdoor sign and dibber set from Gift Moments is just the ticket – especially because you can personalise both items at no additional cost. With this exclusive deal, you’ll get one metal or slate sign and a wooden dibber for £15.49, plus £2.95 postage. You’ll also receive 10% off your next order from Gift Moments!

Claim offer now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

Whether you envisage the sign hanging on a garden shed, nailed onto a gate or even displayed by a vegetable patch, there are a range of stylish designs you can choose from and customise with your own messaging.

Specifications:

  • Printed metal sign – 204g, 19.4 x 30.5 x 0.1cm
  • Printed slate sign – 535g, 9.5 x 25 x 0.5cm
  • Engraved slate sign – 765g, 20 x 22 x 0.5cm

The engravable dibber, meanwhile, is available in three different variations, so you can choose from the Personalised Message Dibber, the Personalised Wooden Dibber or the Personalised Floral Dibber. Each has a tapered end so it can easily be pushed into the soil, as well as a handy 10cm ruler guide along the handle to help with planting.

Specification of all dibbers:

  • Height – 20cm
  • Handle length – 11cm
  • Weight – 80g

Offer ends 13/07/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

Claim offer now

You can find all our current shopping deals here. If you have any questions about the deal product or the related services, please contact the provider directly. If you have any questions about the online shopping deal itself, or if you would like to work with us as a partner, please email deals@bikeradar.com
author: Steve Newell
